value.title: Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Join Scott Hanselman, Donovan Brown, and Lara Rubbelke as they host the engineers who build & use Azure, demo it, answer questions, and share insights.

topItems.title: Introducing Flexible Server in Azure Database for PostgreSQL & MySQL | Azure Friday
topItems.excerpt: Sunil Kamath joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can run your MySQL or Postgres database as a managed database on Azure without giving up the control you want while taking advantage of the benefits of a PaaS offering.  0:00 – Overview 4:44 – Demo 8:54 – Customizing Flexible Server in the CLI 10:41
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oFlKRdr0MLE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: Using Entity Framework Core with Azure SQL DB and Azure Cosmos DB | Azure Friday
topItems.excerpt: Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how to use Entity Framework (EF) Core with Azure SQL DB and Azure Cosmos DB. EF Core is a lightweight, extensible, open source, and cross-platform version of the popular Entity Framework data access technology.  0:00 – Overview 1:43 – Using Entity Framework Core with
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FFgS_k_Muk8" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: Bring compute, storage, and intelligence to the edge with Azure Stack Edge | Azure Friday
topItems.excerpt: Dipti Pai joins Scott Hanselman to show how to run containerized and VM workloads to get quick, actionable insights at the edge—where data is created—using purpose-built hardware-as-a-service with Azure Stack Edge.  0:00 – Overview 0:55 – What is Azure Stack Edge? 4:09 – Azure Stack Edge in the house
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RHec5lNuYqQ" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

topItems.title: Using Azure Container Registry for building and deploying .NET Core Apps | Azure Friday
topItems.excerpt: You probably know that Azure Container Registry enables you to store and manage container images securely, but did you know it can also be used as a part of your DevOps pipelines? Jeremy Likness shows Scott Hanselman how ACR can manage your images and even build them for you in the cloud.   0:00 – Overview
topItems.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VcZH6AWhUGk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure fundamentals
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of Azure cloud computing.

topItems.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

topItems.title: Create an Azure account
topItems.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Create your first virtual machine as you discover the power of Azure cloud computing and storage, along with services that help you explore new software paradigms.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Azure global network of physical datacenters, the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and Microsoft service guarantees.

value.title: Manage identity and access in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to work with subscriptions, users, and groups by configuring Microsoft Azure Active Directory for workloads.

topItems.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

topItems.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Architect infrastructure operations in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor, analyze, and manage the ongoing operation of your infrastructure in Azure.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy
topItems.excerpt: Learn about tools Azure provides for policy and standards management that support your teams' ownership and development of their resources in the cloud.

topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

Discover how to migrate and extend your Linux-based workloads on Azure with improved scalability, security, and privacy.

value.title: Architect storage infrastructure in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to architect storage solutions for your applications in Azure.

topItems.title: Choose a data storage approach in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how using Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Cosmos DB - or a combination of them - for your business scenario is the best way to get the most performant solution.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

topItems.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
topItems.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

topItems.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and C# or JavaScript code to connect it to Azure Storage.

value.title: Get started with artificial intelligence on Azure
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) empowers amazing new solutions and experiences; and Microsoft Azure provides easy to use services to help you get started.

topItems.title: Get started with AI on Azure
topItems.excerpt: With AI, we can build solutions that seemed like science fiction a short time ago; enabling incredible advances in health care, financial management, environmental protection, and other areas to make a better world for everyone.

value.title: Create no-code predictive models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to create and publish machine learning models without writing code.

topItems.title: Use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Training a machine learning model is an iterative process that requires time and compute resources. Automated machine learning can help make it easier.

topItems.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

topItems.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

topItems.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Implement virtual machine host security in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to protect and harden your virtual machines in Azure

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security

topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

value.title: Introduce DevOps Dojo: Create efficiencies that support your business
value.excerpt: Start your DevOps Dojo journey.  Create multidisciplinary DevOps teams by using shared tools and processes that are designed to make your organization’s software development and implementation projects more efficient.

topItems.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
topItems.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

topItems.title: Define the foundation pillars of DevOps: Architecture and Technology
topItems.excerpt: There are three things required to make DevOps happen: the cultural component, tools and technology, and architecture. Discover the last two foundation pillars of DevOps, Architecture and Technology!

topItems.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
topItems.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

topItems.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
topItems.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

topItems.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

topItems.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discover Azure's three approaches to deploying cloud resources -- public, private, and hybrid -- and learn the difference each makes in your Azure services.

topItems.title: Control Azure services with the CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn the steps to install the Azure CLI locally, create a website, and manage Azure resources using the CLI.

topItems.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

topItems.title: Predict costs and optimize spending for Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to use Azure pricing calculator, Azure Cost Management, and Azure Advisor to predict and manage cloud expenses.

topItems.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the virtual private network (VPN) gateway options in Azure and typical scenarios for using a VPN. Create and test VPNs to securely connect sites to Azure.

topItems.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute

topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.
